mapper.insert: insert into enterprise_user(`id`, `enterprise_id`, `user_id`, `manager_flg`, `create_time`,`update_time`) values(#{id}, #{enterpriseId}, #{userId}, #{managerFlg}, now(), now());
mapper.select: select eu.*, p.sgname as userSgname, u.mobile, p.avatar,p.email, p.description from enterprise_user eu left join user_profile p on eu.user_id=p.user_id left join user u on eu.user_id=u.id where enterprise_id=#{enterpriseId} order by id desc
mapper.delete: delete from enterprise_user where enterprise_id=#{enterpriseId} and user_id=#{userId}
